//gola can do anything
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        int a[n];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>a[i];
            cout<<a[i];
        }
        cout<<endl;
        int flag =0,i;
        for(i=n-2;i>=0;i--)
        {
            if(a[i]<a[i+1])
            {
                flag = 1;
                break;
            }
        }
        for(int j=n-1;j>i;j--)
        {
            if(a[i]<a[j])
            {
                swap(a[i],a[j]);
                break;
            }
        }
        if(flag)
        {
            for(int k=0;k<=i;k++)
            {
                cout<<a[k];
            }
            for(int k=n-1;k>=i+1;k--)
            {
                cout<<a[k];
            }
            cout<<endl;
        }
        else
        cout<<"NO NXTBIG\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
